name: Tex Mex Oven-Fried Chicken
description: You won’t believe it is good for you! The same great taste without the deep fryer.

ingredients.name: Tex Mex Gluten Free Crumb Mix

preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 400° F.
  2. Brush chicken thighs with mustard.
  3. Combine Gluten Free Crumb mix, seasoning and paprika in a large bowl or shallow plate.
  4. One at the time, dip chicken thighs in dry mixture, coating evenly.
  5. Place on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner and cook 20–25 minutes (depending on thickness).
  6. Serve with additional toppings, if desired.
tips: Make it a restaurant night in by serving with Loaded Fries.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups vegetables and 1 cup grains or starch.
